data.message: Is there a way to stop seeing everything my friends "like"? I'm missing so many things I'd actually like to see because my newsfeed is being blown up by people I don't even follow. Thanks!

replies.message: Hi Tiffany. There are many ways you can control what you see in your News Feed, such as following or unfollowing friends and choosing to see fewer stories from a person, Page or group that you follow. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2eyusl1. -Hannah

Thank you for getting back to me. However, I don't want to unfollow any of my friends. I just want to see their posts and shares, not all the other random posts they "like". I don't see that listed in the link you sent me.
Tiffany Guarino As usual they skirt the issue and do not address the problem.
Lindakay Rendina Pretty much. It's very frustrating.
